title: Radisson Hotel Group announces the opening of Svelte Delhi
description: Radisson Hotel Group opens Svelte Delhi, a member of Radisson Individuals, in Saket, South Delhi, offering 108 rooms and easy access to major attractions and corporate hubs. The milestone highlights the group's growth in Delhi NCR and the strategic partnership bringing Radisson's signature service to the new hotel.
